com.continuent.tungsten.fsm.core
Class Transition

java.lang.Object
  com.continuent.tungsten.fsm.core.Transition

public class Transition
extends java.lang.Object

Defines a transition between two states with an accompanying guard that determines when the transition can be applied.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Robert Hodges

Transition

                  Guard guard,
                  State input,
                  Action action,
                  State output)
Creates a new transition instance.

Parameters:
name - Transition name
input - Input state
guard - Condition guarding the transition
action - An action to take when the transition is triggered
output - Output state
